categories: Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Bel Corek was a man, who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Corek attended the Imperial Academy, but later became a member of the Alliance to Restore the Republic. He became a Captain in the Alliance Military and was given command of Silverblade Squadron, an X-wing squadron that was based at DVL-181 on the planet Aracara.
